algorithms.RSSalg.resultStatistic

Class Label

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.RSSalg.resultStatistic.Label

  • public class Label
extends java.lang.Object
    Aggregates the votes from multiple ensembles that the instance belongs to one particular label. The entropy of the given label is calculated in the following way:
     for all ensembles from the list i
                for all classifiers in the i-th ensemble j:
                        sum(-probability_ij*Math.log(probability_ij))

    where probability_ij is the confidence of j-th classifier of the i-th ensemble that the instance belongs to this class (confidences of all classifiers from all ensembles are used).
    NOTE: for now these entropies are used only as the confidence of the final MajorityVote classifier and do not affect the results of the experiments

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) double entropy
      Entropy of ensemble votes: for all ensembles from the list i for all classifiers in the i-th ensemble j: sum(-probability_ij*Math.log(probability_ij)) where probability_ij is the confidence of j-th classifier of the i-th ensemble that the instance belongs to this class
      (package private) java.lang.String name
      The label name
      (package private) int noVotes
      Number of ensembles that voted for the label (that predict that the instance belongs to this class)

      Returns the entropy of ensemble votes for this label

      Returns the label name
      int getNoVotes()
      Returns the number of ensembles that predict that the instance belongs to this class (the number of ensembles that render this is the most probable class for the instance)

      Increases the number of ensembles that voted for this label (the number of ensembles that render this is the most probable class for the instance)

      java.lang.String toString()

      Uses the confidence of one classifier to update the current setting of the total entropy of ensemble votes
